item.description:
Every 2nd and 4th Friday evening is Dinner With Dharma at the Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center at 950 Massachusetts Avenue, between Central and Harvard Squares, Cambridge.

QAO (Question and answer opportunity) at the end of the talk will last about ten to fifteen minute.

6:30 p.m. Meditation
7:00 p.m. Dinner (vegan- but ALWAYS ask because it reminds them)
7:30 p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion (could go on for 2 hours or more, but it's supposed to be 90 minutes)
Koan Practice

Solomon Mojtabai, MD, FACS, a retired vascular surgeon from Iran who lives in Boston and now owns and runs a luxury Persian rug business in Quincy, will speak on his research into the dynamic phenomenology of cognition, as mindfulness cognitive behavior therapy relates to Buddhist insights.

Research findings show that MBCBT has a positive impact on human emotional development, behavior, and mental health. Solomon is a retired vascular surgeon with an interest in behavior therapy (based on Ivan Pavlovâ€™s research), cognitive therapy, and mindfulness, and he will be presenting on Mindfulness-Based Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (MBCBT). He will be addressing the common ground and affinity between Buddhist and western psychology as reflected in MBCBT.

We hope that you, friends, and family will join us this Friday night at 6:30 for meditation followed by our Chinese, vegan buffet at 7:00 pm and the presentation at 7:45 pm.

Cost (Include dinner)
Adult: $10 Student: $5 (student ID required)

PLEASE TAKE CASH ONLY. THEY DO NOT Accepts Credit Cards!!!

Take the T to Central Square, http://www.mbta.com....
Walk in TOWARDS Harvard Square until you see 950 Mass Ave on the left (south) side of the street.

For driving directions please check here
http://maps.google.co...
http://pluralism.org/... - HDS Pluralism Project Profile-Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center (GBBCC) - includes history and statistics

We look forward to seeing you there! We'll be there from 6:30pm to7:30pm, likely 9:00 pm, , if we like the talk (and maybe 10 pm - if the socializing afterwards is great).

For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/b... (please visit Maynard's pictures of the place)

http://www.gbbcc.net... - IF you speak and read Mandarin

Pre-Peaceful Dinner Prayer

Meditation/Prayer Recited Before Peacefully Eating the Buffet of Peace

May palms be joined together in every world expressing kindness, compassion, joy, and giving.
May all beings find security in friendship, peace, and loving care.
May calm and mindful practice seed patience and deep equanimity.
May we give rise to spacious hearts and humble thoughts of gratitude.

Ci bei xi she bian fa jie.
Xi fu jie yuan li ren tian.
Chan jing jie heng ping deng ren.
Chan quei gan an da yuan xi.

It would be nice if we could have the Chinese characters AND a careful English translation of this text.
